mapper.select: SELECT book.log_id,borrowed_date,returned bookInfo.info_id, bookInfo.title, bookInfo.pub_date, bookInfo.ISBN,bookInfo.amount, bookInfo.publisher, bookInfo.pub_date, book_category.*, reader.* FROM book INNER JOIN bookInfo ON book.book_info_id=bookInfo.info_id INNER JOIN reader ON book.reader_id = reader.reader_id INNER JOIN book_category ON bookInfo.category_id = book_category.category_id
